txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
txt_cn: 生命的意义不在于发现你自己，而在于创造你自己。
author: George Bernard Shaw

txt_en: We are young. So let's set the world on fire. We can burn brighter than the sun.
txt_cn: 我们是青年，让我们点亮世界，释放生命，胜过太阳。
author: Fun., "We Are Young"

txt_en: If there's one thing to be taught, it's dreams are made to be caught.
txt_cn: 唯有一事值得谨记，有梦想就要奋力追逐。
author: Gavin Degraw, "Fire"

txt_en: We're losing all this daylight but soon the moon's gonna rise.
txt_cn: 虽然白日将尽，但有一轮新月正冉冉高升。
author: Young Rising Sons, “Turnin'”

txt_en: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
txt_cn: 拥有成功的人生，秘诀在于发现自己此生该做什么，然后付诸行动。
author: Henry Ford

txt_en: I took my bruises, took my lumps. Fell down and I got right back up.
txt_cn: 身上带着淤青和肿块，摔倒了也立刻爬起来。
author: Eminem, "Beautiful"

txt_en: In any case you mustn't confuse a single failure with a final defeat.
txt_cn: 永远不要把一次失败与最终失败混为一谈。
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Tender Is the Night"

txt_en: Reading gives us someplace to go when we have to stay where we are.
txt_cn: 当我们困在原地时，阅读可以带我们去遨游。
author: Mason Cooley

txt_en: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
txt_cn: 别沿着别人的路走，要去开辟自己的路，留下自己的足迹。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
txt_cn: 比起无所事事，会犯错的人生不仅更光荣，也更有意义。
author: 萧伯纳

txt_en: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying.
txt_cn: 你不一定要获胜，但你必须不断尝试。
author: Jason Mraz

txt_en: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
txt_cn: 智慧就是适应变化的能力。
author: 斯蒂芬·霍金

txt_en: It isn't where you came from. It's where you're going that counts.
txt_cn: 起点并不重要，重要的是，你要去往何方。
author: Ella Fitzgerald

txt_en: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
txt_cn: 你一脚踩在紫罗兰上，它却把香味留在了你的脚上，这便是宽恕。
author: 马克·吐温

txt_en: Motivation comes from working on things we care about.
txt_cn: 为在意的事付出努力，动力随之而来。
author: Sheryl Sandberg

txt_en: You should love and take care of yourself because after all, it's your own life.
txt_cn: 要学会爱自己，照顾自己，毕竟生活是你自己的。
author: 《恋恋笔记本》

txt_en: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
txt_cn: 务必要去尝试你认为不可能的事。
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

txt_en: Give every day the chance to become the most beautiful day of your life.
txt_cn: 把每天都过成你生命中最美好的一天。
author: Mark Twain
